FuncDef: This command configures the ATM MDA into a mode with the increased VC scale (16k VCs, as opposed to 8K VCs). ESM is supported only in 16K VCs mode. In 16K VCs mode, there is only one queue allocated to each VC in the ATM MDA. In 8K VCs mode, there are two queues allocated per VC.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the VC scale. Values-max8k-vc, max16k-vc.
